title: Powdered whole milk could be a culprit in the ByHeart botulism outbreak, tests show
description: An outbreak of botulism that sickened dozens of babies may be related to powdered whole milk.
content: An outbreak of botulism that sickened dozens of babies may be related to powdered whole milk.
